summary: Add-on for bodyslide, contains all missed Vanilla armors and clothes.
descriptionHtml:
Hi everybody.
Sry for my english it's not my natal language.
But i'm happy to share with you this mod.



[center][URL=http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/2871734967811389213938.jpg][IMG]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/2871734967811389213938.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/center]

[center][URL=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=616244294638947533.jpg][IMG]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/616244294638947533.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/center]

[color=red]2.0[/color]
All Armors bugs are corriged.
All Armors are TBBP and NOBBP.
CBBE and UNP files added (NOBBP and TBBP).

Armors TBBP added:
-Fur B Armor
-Hide Armor light
-Imperial Light Armor
-Leather
-Stormcloak

For previous versions , please read "READ ME".


[center][url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=652875211394111211.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/652875211394111211.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
Now with this mod, you can build alls armors and clothes missed like you want. CBBE, UNP, custom and more!
This mod contains all bodysliders missed in Vanilla style TBBP and NOBBP:

Armors:
-Daedric Vanilla
-Ebony mail and heavy Vanilla
-Orcish Vanilla
-Dwarven Vanilla
-Wolf Vanilla
-Elven cuirass light and heavy vanilla
-Dragonbone Vanilla
-Nightingale Vanilla
-Blades Vanilla
-Thieve's Guild Vanilla
-Dragonscale Vanilla
-Dawnguard Vanilla (5 armors)
-Falmer Heavy Vanilla
-Ivory Vanilla
-Chitin Vanilla Light and Heavy
-Nordic carved Vanilla
-Stahlrim VanillaHeavy and Light
-Bonemold Vanilla Heavy Medium and Light
-Tribal glass (request armor mod, see "What mods is used for this armors?")

*New:
-Fur B Armor
-Hide Armor light
-Imperial Light Armor
-Leather
-Stormcloak

Clothes (only TBBP):
-Archmage
-Blindmothpriest
-Cultist
-Darkelf
-Emperor
-Fineclothes (all versions)
-Greybeardrobe
-Mageapprentice
-Monk
-Necromancer
-Redguardoutfit
-Robemythicdawn
-Skaal
-Telvanni (all versions)
-Temple
-Talmor
-Vampclothes
-Vampirerobes (all versions)
-Warlock
-Weddingdress
-Woundsarivanya
-Woundsusanna
-Jester
-Magejourneyman
-Miraakrobes
-Yarlclothes (all versions)
-Robedarkbrotherhood

Extra:
Daedric Spike Replacer







[center][url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=279861211394111253.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/279861211394111253.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

You need to install that before:

Requires:
-DLC Dragonborn
-DLC Dawnguard


1. CBBE
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url]
2. Bodyslide 2.0
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/url]
3. BodySlide Outfits and Mods
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32731/?]BodySlide Outfits and Mods[/url]
4. XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS[/url]
6. HDT Breast And Butt Physics
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/?]HDT Breast And Butt Physics - TBBP BBP Supported by threedeedevi[/url]

[color=red]First part of Vanilla Bodyslide:[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12273/?]Calientes Vanilla Outfits for CBBE by Caliente[/url]





[center][URL=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=420722294638947614.jpg][IMG]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/420722294638947614.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/center]
-Daedric textures:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3395/?]Evil Incarnate Daedric Gear by Omniel[/url]

-Ebony Textures (Black out edition):
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4903/?]Ebony 4k by TTKRickJames[/url]
-Boots (install only boots):
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4559/?]Armor Restyled by newermind43[/url]

-Orcish textures:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29831/?]aMidianBorn Orcish Armor by CaBaL[/url]
-Helm:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7715/?]Masked Orcish Helmet by Shodan44[/url]

-Dwarveen textures:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4818/?]Heroic Dwarven Armor and Weapons by mgbeach[/url]

-Wolf textures (grey version):
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34147/?]aMidianBorn wolf armor and skyforge weapons by EmeraldReign 83Willow CaBaL[/url]

-Elven textures:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5600/?]Mystic Elven Armor - HD by Sader[/url]

-Dragonbone textures:
Can't be finded on Nexus :/
-Crown:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5803/?]Crown Helmets by pnkrd[/url]

-Nightingale textures:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6187/?]Cartoon Nightingale Armor HQ by Yuril[/url]
-Boots:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4559/?]Armor Restyled by newermind43[/url]

-Blades textures:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41731/?]aMidianBorn Blades Armor by CaBaL[/url]

-Thieve's Guild textures:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6628/?]Thieves Guild Armor_Denim Style HQ and Logo SoA by Yuril[/url]

-Nordic carved textures:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34996/?]aMidianBorn Nordic Carved by CaBaL[/url]

-Stahlrim Heavy Textures:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32399/?]Glorious Stalhrim Retex by Gloriouz[/url]

-Tribal glass ([color=red]MUST BE INSTALLED[/color])
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10235/?]Tribal Might Armor HD -Glass Armor Rehaul- by Hairon[/url]

-Stormcloak and City Guards textures:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42404/?]Stormcloak and City Guards by FrankFamily[/url]

-Imperial Heavy Armor textures: (amazing work)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34113/?]SkyRealism - Imperial Heavy Armor by MTichenor[/url]





[center][url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=994386211394111166.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/994386211394111166.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
I thanks [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686/?]Caliente[/url] for her amazing work on Bodyslide.
Big thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3412922/?]jcanders [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/163985/?]atoom [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5182604/?]IronDusk33 [/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2234491/?]AndarielHalo [/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5050555/?]TheFishFace [/url]for their really nice feedback.










CLIPPINGS:
Bodyslide is not perfect.
I'm not perfect.
But,
If you have clipping with armors, please to use this solution:
http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope (tools link).

Go in your meshe file (i take exemple "magejourneyman":
...meshes/clothes/magejourneyman

after open nif file with NifSkope:
find "baseshape" (like the picture)
[img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/657290532943Untitled1.jpg[/img]



Go to "block/remove branch" and do it.
[img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/850508Capture2.jpg[/img]




And save file
[img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/808773532943Untitled.jpg[/img]



Repeat the same for 0 and 1.
[img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/453452Capture4.jpg[/img]

*WARNING
that working only with FULL clothes and armors, if you have visible skins, like arms or belly, don't do it, because you need your baseshape.
author: s666

files.name: Bodyslide add-ons Vanilla clothes extension Beta
